image.title: Image Format Converter
image.description: Convert images between different formats (JPEG, PNG, WebP, etc.). Upload an image and select the target format to convert.
image.example: For example: Convert a PNG image to JPEG format to reduce file size.
image.exampleMessage: Please upload an image to convert its format

base64.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
base64.description: Encode and decode text using Base64. Enter text and click the corresponding button to encode or decode.
base64.example: For example: Convert plain text to Base64 encoding, or convert Base64 encoding back to original text.

input.placeholder: Enter text to encode or decode

output.placeholder: Encoded or decoded result will appear here

base64.encodeError: Encoding error, please check your input text
base64.decodeError: Decoding error, please ensure you've entered valid Base64 text

timestamp.title: Timestamp Converter
timestamp.description: Convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable dates. Enter a timestamp or select a date to convert.
timestamp.example: For example: Convert Unix timestamp to readable date format, or convert date to timestamp.

url.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
url.description: Encode and decode URLs. Enter a URL and click the corresponding button to encode or decode.
url.example: For example: Convert URLs with special characters to encoded format, or convert encoded URLs back to original format.

input.placeholder: Enter URL to encode or decode

output.placeholder: Encoded or decoded result will appear here

md5.title: MD5 Hash Generator
md5.description: Generate MD5 hash for input text. Enter text and click generate to get the MD5 hash value.
md5.example: For example: Convert text to MD5 hash for data integrity verification or password storage.

input.placeholder: Enter text to generate MD5 hash

regex.title: Regular Expression Tester
regex.description: Test regular expression patterns. Enter a regex pattern and text to test, then click test to see matches.
regex.example: For example: Use regex to match email addresses, phone numbers, etc.

flags.label: Flags
flags.placeholder: g, i, m, s, u, y

color.title: Color Converter
color.description: Convert colors between different formats (HEX, RGB, HSB). Select a color and click convert to get color values in different formats.
color.example: For example: Convert HEX color values to RGB or HSB format for different design scenarios.

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.description: Generate QR codes from text content. Enter text, set the QR code size, and click generate to create a QR code.
qrcode.example: For example: Generate QR codes for URLs, text messages, etc., for easy sharing and scanning.

input.placeholder: Enter text to generate QR code

number.title: Number Base Converter
number.description: Convert numbers between different bases (binary, octal, decimal, hexadecimal, etc.). Enter a number and select source and target bases to convert.
number.example: For example: Convert decimal numbers to hexadecimal, or binary numbers to decimal.

ip.title: IP Address Parser
ip.description: Parse IP address type, validity, and network type. Enter an IP address and click parse to get detailed information.
ip.example: For example: Parse IPv4 or IPv6 addresses to get address type, validity, and network type information.

json.title: JSON Formatter
json.description: Format and minify JSON text. Enter JSON text and click the corresponding button to format or minify.
json.example: For example: Format compressed JSON text into readable form, or minify formatted JSON text into compact form.

output.placeholder: Formatted or minified result will appear here

markdown.title: Markdown Preview Tool
markdown.description: Preview Markdown text rendering. Enter Markdown text and click the preview button to see the rendered result.
markdown.example: For example: Preview Markdown text with headings, lists, tables, code blocks, etc.
markdown.emptyInput: Please enter Markdown text before previewing

codeformat.title: Code Formatter
codeformat.description: Supports formatting for Python, SQL, etc.
codeformat.pythonDesc: Supports Python code formatting and Ruff diagnostics, with single/double quote options.
codeformat.sqlDesc: Supports SQL code formatting, auto indentation and beautification.
codeformat.jsDesc: Supports JavaScript code formatting, with single/double quote options.
codeformat.cssDesc: Supports CSS code formatting and beautification.
codeformat.htmlDesc: Supports HTML code formatting and beautification.
